summary: This bill, the "Supporting Access to Falls Education and Prevention and Strengthening Training Efforts and Promoting Safety Initiatives for Veterans Act of 2025," aims to reduce falls among veterans. It establishes an Office of Falls Prevention within the Department of Veterans Affairs, outlining its functions, including developing standards of care, public education, and research. The bill mandates falls risk assessments and prevention services for veterans in nursing homes and extended care services. It also addresses safe handling techniques and a pilot program for home modifications to prevent falls, as well as several reporting requirements.
